library(audio)
first_fourier_seires <- function(x){
  first_addend = 4*sin(x)/pi
  second_addend = 4*sin(3*x)/(3*pi)
  third_addend = 4*sin(5*x)/5*pi
  fourth_addend = 4*sin(7*x)/7*pi
  return(first_addend+second_addend)
}

play_and_plot <- function(amplitude,period,shift,time){
  time= seq(0,2*pi*time,.01)
  output = amplitude*sin(period*time + shift)
  play(output)
  begin = head(output,n= 2000)
  horizontal = c(1:2000)
  plot(horizontal,begin)
  #plot(time,output)
}
#time is in number of periods
